oscar.name: rapt
oscar.summary: apt repos control for clusters, image creation and maintenance
oscar.description: Tool for setting up, exporting apt repositories and executing apt commands for only these repositories. Use it as high level DEB replacement which resolves dependencies automatically. This tool is very useful for clusters. It can: - prepare an debian repository - export it through apache - execute apt commands applying only to this repository (locally) - execute apt commands on the cluster nodes applying only to this repository. This makes installing packages, creating cluster node images, updating revisions much simpler than with rpm.
